function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Health and safety risks in indoor spaces due to covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Robots in healthcare could transmit contagious diseases if not properly sanitized between patients.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decentralization on paper in the context of the smart city mission in india","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate time management and organization","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Shortage of hospital beds and medical equipment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk perception leading to modification of destination preferences","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Samba firmware warming up period of 10 minutes may lead to delays in accessing sensor data, impacting real-time monitoring and response","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Qualitative comparison of technologies","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortage of goods in grocery retail stores","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in the number of entomologists working at who’s headquarters in geneva","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Drinking water treatment and distribution","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Massive transmission of fake news over social media creating chaos and stress","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proven treatment for covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to nature and outdoor spaces in residential buildings","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ai and big data for coronavirus testing and patient screening","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in sars-cov-2 genetic loading in wastewater corresponding to active covid-19 cases","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Local transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pressure on entrepreneurs to deliver solutions and overcome challenges","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in covid-19 cases and affected countries during the study period","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Call for strengthening vector control following the zika epidemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of support for carbon-dependent member states in transitioning to renewable energy","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continued reporting of new cases of covid-19 in different parts of risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient washing area","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Viral aerosols exhibit higher uv susceptibility at higher rh.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of relative humidity rh on droplet size may influence the transmission of contagious diseases in the built
